subject: A question for the researchers ????
author: Ralph Smith
full_text:
Hi everyone,

 I have been hearing the word " Purple " alot lately in my sessions.
Does anyone in the group know what it pertains to ? It's been bugging 
me alot. Could that be a special group on their side ? I have no clue. 
Also has anyone questioned the voices if they have a last name ? All I 
hear on the RS boxes are first names and haven't recieved anyone 
telling me their last name. Does Mike and Lisa have a last name ? Did 
anyone here ever ask the question " Are you Demonic Spirits ? " What 
was their reply if any ? I did one time and got a response saying " 
All of us are ". Don't know whether I believe that Spirit or not. 
Probably a Joker saying that. I have asked for specific people for 
them to find so I could talk to and got an answer " We're looking. " 
Then I never heard from them after that. I'm still waiting to be 
contacted by Telephone so far nothing yet. They make me laugh 
sometimes. I had the RS-12-469 on the one day I was just listening to 
what they were chatting about. I found my daughters old Fart Machine 
and was playing with it while the RS radio was running to see if it 
still works which it did. All of a sudden after I made it " Toot " I 
heard a female voice say " Phew !!! ."
LOL, I guess she thought I really passed one. Also, the other day I 
was on the RS 12-469 and I said " Hello Lisa how are you doing 
today ? " Then a few seconds later I hear a female voice say " 
Bruce ? " like she thought that I was Bruce talking to her. I told her 
no it's me Ralph from Harrisburg,PA she replied "Oh, okay fine. " I 
hear all the time voices calling for Lisa she must be a very Popular 
Technician. Oh well I guess it was more than one question LOL. Hey you 
all take care and " Keep the Sweep " a new slogan for here LOL. just 
kidding. You all have a great day.

Regards,

Ralph the Ghost Hunter
